heroSubtitle: Access support, resources, and tools for Quantum Harbour clients
intro: Welcome to the Quantum Harbour client area. Use the links below to access support, open tickets, or get remote assistance.

items.title: Open Support Portal
items.description: Log in to view your tickets, submit new requests, and track progress on open issues.

items.title: Submit a Ticket
items.description: Create a new support request directly. You'll receive a ticket number and email confirmation.

items.title: Email Support
items.description: Send an email to our support team. Emails are automatically converted to tickets.

items.title: Remote Assistance
items.description: Allow our technicians to connect to your computer securely for hands-on troubleshooting.

items.title: Download Agent
items.description: Download and install our remote monitoring agent if it's not already on your device.

items.title: Service Status
items.description: Check the current status of Quantum Harbour services and any ongoing incidents.

emergencySupport.title: Severity 1 Emergency?
emergencySupport.description: If your business is down or you're experiencing a critical security incident, don't wait for a ticket response.
instructions: Have your company name and brief description ready
Stay by your phone for callback if needed
emergencySupport.note: Sev 1 calls are answered 24/7. Use this line only for genuine business-critical emergencies.

resources.title: Client Resources
resources.description: Helpful guides and documentation for Quantum Harbour clients.

links.title: How to Submit a Good Support Ticket
